name: The Dark Tower
description:
The Dark Tower is a Bitsy game where the player must solve puzzles and pass trials in the search of treasure!

I am a computer science student and I designed the game in about a week for a game development class. I spent a lot of time during that week making this game so I hope you enjoy it!

Download/Source Code

https://www.dropbox.com/s/6bl05jrzf3efaxg/The%20Dark%20Tower.zip?dl=0

Simply download the zip file, unzip it, and run the index.html file inside with a web browser (Google Chrome is recommended).

If no audio is playing, ensure the index.html file was not removed from the folder you unzipped. The audio files must be located in the same folder as the index.html file for the audio assets to be played.

 and Music Used

Falcom free music use - https://www.falcom.co.jp/music_use/

The following soundtracks from Trails of Cold Steel (developed by Falcom) were used:

Remains Sleeping Underground / Sen no Kiseki OST / Copyright © Nihon Falcom Corporation (caves 2 theme)

Investigation / Sen no Kiseki OST / Copyright © Nihon Falcom Corporation (teleport room theme)

The Jade City of Bareahard / Sen no Kiseki OST / Copyright © Nihon Falcom Corporation (treasure room theme)

The Time Has Come / Sen no Kiseki OST / Copyright © Nihon Falcom Corporation (initial chase room theme)

Other music used is from Innocent Life: A Futuristic Harvest Moon for the PS2/PSP/PSVita. ArtePiazza developed Innocent Life, but I could not find copyright information regarding their music, and seeing how the game is over 12 years old now and I am using it for non-profit, I decided it was okay to use it.

The following soundtracks from Innocent Life: A Futuristic Harvest Moon were used:

Heartflame Lighthouse (outside theme)

Easter Ruins Cave (caves 1 theme)

Dr. Hope Collapses (chase theme)

The following sound effects from Innocent Life: A Futuristic Harvest Moon were used:

Special Item (when picking up an item)

Puzzle Solved (when opening a new path)

Jewel Received (when finding the treasure)

All of the other sound effects were either made custom by me or taken from https://freesound.org/.
